himare.name: Himarë
himare.description: Himarë is a picturesque coastal town in southern Albania, known for its stunning beaches, dramatic cliffs, and rich cultural heritage. It's a popular destination for both beach lovers and history enthusiasts.

historical.name: Himarë Castle
historical.description: Medieval fortress with panoramic sea views

natural.name: Gjipe Beach
natural.description: Famous for its dramatic cliffs and crystal-clear waters

natural.name: Jale Beach
natural.description: Long sandy beach with clear blue waters

arrival_options.description: Accessible via coastal road from Vlora and Saranda
